inn1.comm: moves in a hint, bowled on a good length, gets outside the line does Finch and taps it into the off side
pitched fuller this time, curving in, driven firmly but straight into the stumps at the other end

missed run-out, suicidal run there, Hughes responded to Finch's call and was running to the danger end, Finch flicked it to square leg and Hughes responded, he was in the middle of the pitch when Dilshan aimed but missed by a mile
pitched up outside off, gets forward and pushes that firmly towards mid-off, there's time for a single
curving in again, short of a good length, gets on the back foot and taps it into the leg side
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot to silly mid-on
short of a good length on middle, Hughes gets on the back foot and pushes it back to the bowler
swinging in towards middle and leg, clipped through square leg into the deep for a single
walking into the shot as he plays that, plays that just wide of mid-off there
shaping away from the right hander, in the channel outside off, leaves that one alone
opens the face on that one and guides him behind point into the deep for a single
slightly short on middle and off, gets on the back foot and turns it away into the leg side
lands on a good length outside off, rocks forward and defends it to cover
swinging in, on a good length it lands, gets outside the line and drives it to silly mid-on
drops that short does Kula and Finch pulls that one over square leg, doesn't strike it as well as he would have liked, a little high on the bat, but two runs as Thirimanne gives chase
short of a good length, knocked away into the off side on the front foot
shortish on the off, crunched off the back foot to the bowler
swinging in, gets across and drives it firmly but straight to midwicket
sliding on leg stump, Hughes moves across and taps it down towards square leg
slightly short outside off and that's been cut down towards third man for a single
Finch is gone! A loose shot that, goodish length and he just pushed through uppishly, looped up to extra cover and ends up being an easy catch, Australia have lost one early
in the channel outside off, moving away and he leaves that one alone
a slight inside edge on that one as he steps forward to defend, he's off the mark
slightly short on the off, rocks on the back foot and stabs that towards point
pitches that up on middle and it's driven soundly down the ground, towards mid-on, no run on offer though
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and taps it in front of extra cover
bowls it on a length outside off, moving in just a hint and he leaves that one be
bowls it on a good length outside off, holds its line, leaves it alone
short of a good length outside off, pushes it past cover for a single
slightly short on middle, gets across to that straight one and turns it towards midwicket
teasing away-swing on that one from Mathews and Bailey leaves that one through to the keeper
again, a little closer to the stumps and tempting driving length, leaves it alone
goodish length on the off, gets forward and pushes it towards extra cover

dropped, tough chance at extra cover, Jeevan Mendis is the man, pushed on a good length and it's driven loosely again, tries to get it over the fielder and manages to do so but just about, Mendis jumped, got his right hand to it, but couldn't hold on
steps forward and knocks that one down into the off side
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and pats it in front of cover
lots of width on that one and Hughes has to reach it to try to cut it, but misses, called a wide
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and guides that one towards point
short of a good length on the off, pushes it towards cover off the front foot now
ooh, moves away after pitching on leg and appeared to square him up just a little, gets forward and taps it towards cover
shortish on middle, gets front and across and works it towards midwicket

appeal for lbw and he's given, Hughes has called for a review, he showed his bat immediately after it struck him on the pads, seemed like it landed on leg and Hughes tried to work it square, missed, no impact with the bat at all, Hot Spot doesn't capture anything, and it would have gone on to hit middle and off, that's plumb, Erasmus has made the right call
in the channel outside off stump and he's left that one alone to the keeper
fullish on the off and that's driven neatly towards mid-off off the front foot
pitched up on the off and he leans forward to drive that but does so straight to mid-off
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards cover
moved well across to that one, clipped that one towards fine leg for a single
swinging away there, just eased it off the front foot past cover for a single to keep strike
big swing from Kula on that one, landed on middle on a length and Hussey turned it into the leg side towards midwicket
ooh, nipped back in sharply from outside off and Hussey shoulders his arms to that one
steps forward and taps that down into the off side off the front foot
ooh, held it back a little and this one didn't move in as much as Hussey expected, flirts with that one, ends up playing inside the line and is beaten
plays away form his body slightly, guides it past a diving point, calls for a second and gets it in the end, Malinga at third man throws to the non-striker's end
angling in towards middle, gets on the back foot and defends it to mid-off
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it down the pitch to the bowler
short of a good length outside off, tries to crack it past point, gets an inside edge towards the keeper
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and pushes it towards cover from the crease
slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide
shortish on the off, tries to punch it through the off side, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
nicely timed, angling in towards middle and he just punches it down the pitch, firmly done, and Malinga who gives chase from mid-on has no chance
angling in towards off and middle, pushes it back towards the bowler
whipped off the back foot through square leg and runs hard to come back for the second, busy player is Hussey, like his brother
big swing and he leaves that alone, didn't miss the off stump by much there
knocked away into the off side off the front foot
pitches on a length outside off, gets a thick inside edge towards midwicket as he tries to drive that through the off side
on a good length and it's pushed through to extra cover on the front foot
short of a good length on the off, pushes it from the crease to point
short of a length outside off and Bailey gets back to crunch it towards point
short again and it's cut again but straight to Dilshan at point
too wide and it's called by the umpire, way beyond the line
shortish and this comes back in sharply, short of a good length and it nipped back in to beat him through the gate, Bailey just missed that as he tried to whip it square
good carry to the keeper this time and it leaves the right hander, lets that one go through

there are two slips in place, short and wide and Bailey cuts hard, not quite dropped, gets a thick edge does Bailey and Jayawardene at second slip got a finger to it as he leapt, Ajantha Mendis at third man slid to his left but couldn't drag it back in
hitting a good length and it's been pushed towards mid-off
edged and well short of slip, some away swing for Malinga right away and Hussey pushed at that one, got a nick but it didn't carry
slightly short on the off and that's been pushed towards cover from the crease

missed run-out, there was no way Hussey would have made it, Jeevan Mendis at extra cover did a good job moving to his right, collecting with one hand, he tried to under-arm that onto the non-striker's end but lost his balance a bit there and the throw turned out to be wayward
pushed into the off side off the front foot
on a good length outside off and he guides that one towards point from the crease
pushed in front of mid-on who's a little deep and they scramble through for a single, a direct hit at the non-striker's end but he's in
slightly short outside off and that's been punched towards mid-on from the crease
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and stabs it to cover

where did that come from? Bailey looks for a release and gets it, slightly short outside off and he swings it hard over the deep midwicket boundary to be caught well by a spectator sitting in the front row, well done
guides that one behind point, wide of third man, for a couple of runs
gets on the back foot and pushes that one towards mid-on
shortish outside off, tries to chop that towards point, gets an under-edge
short and wide and that's been crashed through point and cover, dispatched through that gap, plenty of width there
sweetly timed this time, short of a good length and not much width as the first one but he just punches that nicely through the same gap again
a fielder has been pushed back, that's crunched through cover into the deep for a single now
on middle and leg and that's been clipped behind square for a single
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and works it towards midwicket
slightly short on the off, rocks back and crunches it towards extra cover
beaten through the gate, slight movement back in towards the batsman and Bailey was caught just trying to drive down straight, but a little outside the line, didn't miss the off stump by much
thick outside edge to third man as he tries to drive a full delivery through the covers
goodish length on the off, tries to force that through extra cover but checks his shot and ends up playing it towards mid-on
slightly short on the off and it's knocked down into the leg side
pitched on a length on the off, tries to drive it hard through off but the bat turns in his hand there and he ends up playing it to mid-on, no single
short of a length outside off, nips away and he sees that one go through
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it into the off side
shortish on middle, worked through midwicket into the deep for a couple of runs, Australia have brought up their half-century
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it towards cover

Well taken at midwicket by Thirimanne, short and it was nicely picked by Bailey, seized the length early and pulled it well but found Thirimanne, who leapt, timed his jump right, intercepted it and took a sharp one. The umpire was checking for a no-ball and replays show Malinga had a tiny part of his foot behind the line at the time of landing, so all good there, Australia have lost ther third
slides it on the pads and he's off the mark straightaway, clips it through square leg and gets a couple in the deep
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the leg side
stifled appeal for lbw, would have gone down leg, tried to clip it into the leg side and missed
short of a good length outside off and that's been left through to the keeper
goodish length on the off, gets forward, outside the line, and defends it back to the bowler
short of a good length on middle, turned off the back foot through square leg for a single
pitches it full on the off and it's driven through the line to mid-off
in the channel outside off and he leaves that one alone to the keeper
short of a good length and he gets on the back foot and drops it down into the leg side
lovely timing from Smith, straight on middle and leg and he turns the face to force that through square leg, it just raced away, smooth beginning for Smith
short of a good length, rocks on the back foot and drops it into the off side
slightly short outside off, rocks back and taps it down in front of cover
on middle and leg and he turns that one past midwicket this time to pinch a single
short of a length and it's pushed into the off side from the crease

Smith goes! A thin inside edge as he goes for the drive, pitched on a length outside off and Smith tried to go hard at that through extra cover, it came back in just a hint, and Smith got a thin inside edge through to the keeper
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot, defends it towards cover
lands on a length outside off and he drives at that through the line past the bowler
beaten, this one leaves the right hander, short of a good length outside off and nips away to just go past the outside edge, Maxwell withdraws belatedly
angling towards middle and it's been clipped through square leg into the deep for a single
a thick inside edge as he tries to push that through the off side, rolls down to midwicket
short and Hussey cashes in, gets on the back foot and slaps it hard past midwicket, dragged it from outside off, struck it really well
shortish outside off, punched away towards extra cover from the crease into the deep
beaten, caught walking on that one as he tried to defend, moved away off the pitch to just go past the outside edge
angling in towards off and middle, opens the face as he defends that one to point
angling in towards middle, gets front and across and defends it to cover
back of a length on middle, just knocks that one down into the leg side towards midwicket
short of a good length and it's punched towards extra cover off the front foot
Hussey attacks, pitched up outside off and he creams that uppishly, but safely, through extra cover and mid-off
short of a length, has a chance to free his arms there and cuts it towards point
thrashed, but straight to Dilshan at point, short and wide and he went hard at that one but couldn't get it past Dilshan
in the channel outside off and he lets that one go as it holds its line
shortish outside off and he has nothing to do with that one, leaves it be
angling in towards middle, rocks on the back foot and defends it to mid-on
goodish length outside off and Maxwell strikes that to cover off the front foot
goes for the pull, short of a length and the shot was on, tried to go over square leg and missed
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and defends it to cover
beaten, Maxwell's a little iffy here, Angelo pushes it on a length and gets it to deviate away from the batsman, Maxwell goes for the drive and misses
slightly short outside off, opened the face slightly there, a bit of an edge wide of third man and they come back for the second
turns away, a short legspinner and Hussey doesn't spare it, short and wide, moves away and cuts it well through point
slides that one down the leg side and it's called a wide, goes straight on, no spin there
floating it on middle and it's pushed straight to midwicket
shortish outside off, punched towards deep extra cover for a single
tickles that one really fine, lands on leg stump and he turned the face on that one, picked up three runs

run-out, turns it into the leg side just a little square of midwicket, Dilshan is the man there, he moved to his right, slid, collected it and threw down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Mendis thought of collecting the throw initially but decided to let it be in the end as it was on its way to the stumps, Hussey is gone, this is a huge blow for Australia, Hussey called for a single, there was some hesitation and he was caught short in the end
short on middle, turns in and he punches it past midwicket for a single

Six down! Mathews strikes, lovely delivery, just outside off stump, drew the batsman forward with a good length and got it to nip away just a touch, Maxwell was committed to the drive as he walked forward, got a thin edge and Perera made no mistake behind the stumps
short of a good length outside off, drops that towards cover
goodish length outside off, stretches forward and defends him to cover
slides that one away from the off stump and gets it to move away, leaves that one alone to the keeper
angling in towards the off stump, strides forward and drops it into the off side
beaten, almost another Maxwell there, slight deviation away from the batsman off the pitch again, the only difference this time is Cutting, who was also caught walking, didn't get an outside edge
floating it on middle, drives it down the ground towards long-on for a single
comes down the pitch to that delivery and plays it to midwicket
flighted on middle, pushed down to long-on for one, Cutting is off the mark in international cricket
poor ball, full toss outside off and Haddin cracks that through extra cover and mid-off for a welcome boundary
flatter on middle and off this time, reaches forward and plays it to the bowler
slides it straight on middle and plays it down the track
short of a good length outside off, drops it down into the off side
shortish on the off, rocks on the back foot and defends into the off side
angling in towards middle, plays it from the crease into the off side now
angling in towards middle, head down and solidly defended towards cover
in the channel and holds its line, Haddin lets that one go
in the channel outside off, turns away and he leaves that one alone
angling in towards middle, rocks forward and defends it back to the bowler
flighted on middle, steps out of the crease and drives it to long-on
goodish length outside off, reaches for it and stabs it to cover
floating it straight on the off, steps forward and defends it to the bowler
on a length and it's driven straight to extra cover
in the channel outside off stump, moving away and he lets that one go
fullish outside off and that's guided towards point from the crease
slightly short outside off, guides that one down to third man for a single
bowled it on a good length on middle, slightly cramped there, defended towards cover from the crease
beaten, short of a good length and slightly movement away from the right hander, Haddin flirts with it and is beaten
shortish outside off and it's guided down to third man for a single to keep strike
length ball angled in, played to short leg
drives a pitched up delivery out to wide mid off
what a beauty, tossed up, lured Haddin forward for a defensive push, batsman leaves a massive gap between and pad, the ball spins in and bounces, somehow contrives to miss the stumps
fullish, pushed out to the off side
Cutting gets the boundary now, Mendis going wide outside off with an overpitched one, and Cutting flays it through covers
defended off the front foot
short of a length from Malinga and Haddin mistimes one as he plays it towards point
beaten, lands around off stump and sneaks past the outside edge after moving away, nicely done
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it towards cover

slides on the pads and Haddin just helps it along through square leg, big gap in that area and they take three runs, that's four, good attempt in the deep but his hand was in contact with the ropes as he reached the ball, 100 up for Australia
beaten once more, nips away from a good length and just goes past the outside edge
"two" shouts Haddin and gets it, timed it nicely off the back foot, pushing it wide of mid-on, and gets a couple of runs
bowls that one full on the off and pushes it towards mid-off
tossed up on middle, drives it towards midwicket where there's a fumble and they get a single
slightly short on the off, he gets back and defends it into the leg side
shortish on middle, turns it square for a comfortable single
turns in from outside off, chops that wide of cover for a quick single
quicker one on middle and leg, pushes it towards midwicket from the crease
flighted on middle, gets forward to the pitch and defends that one
drives that one down to long-on for a single
lobbed up into the leg side after a leading edge, floated  on leg stump and turned towards middle...
gets forward and across and defends that one towards midwicket
shortish on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it past midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, reaches forward to defend, gets a thick inside edge and it rolls down towards square leg
bowled that one flat on the off stump, defends it back towards the bowler
comes down the track and pushes it back down the pitch
on a good length on the off and holds its line, taps it into the off side
short on middle and there's a yawning gap behind square leg, pulled away with ease for a boundary
shortish outside off, chops that one behind point for a single
in the channel outside off, turns away and he leaves that one be
turns it into the leg side
gets forward and turns it towards midwicket
drives that one down towards long-off for a single
tossed up on middle, clipped through midwicket into the deep for a single
quicker through the air from Jeevan, drives it firmly down the ground past the diving bowler for a single
flighted on middle and he picks a single to long-on
closer on middle and off and that's been pushed into the off side
sliced through point this time for a single
edged, the legspinner, bowled outside off and he reached for it, got a thick edge behind point for a couple of runs
flatter outside off, cracked hard off the front foot in front of cover into the deep for three runs, Kulasekara saves a run diving to his right
goodish length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
shortish on middle, the offspinner this time, mistimes a pull, a thick inside edge wide of short fine leg
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and knocks it down in front of mid-on
a touch too straight from Malinga there, it's clipped square, fine leg is up, but Thirimanne does a good job in the deep to keep them to a single
goodish length on the off and he pushes that firmly back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, Haddin rocks back and defends that one to extra cover
slightly short on the off, rocks back, takes his bottom hand off as he drops it into the off side
slower one this time from Malinga, full on middle and it's played back cautiously by Haddin
short of a length outside off, cut away towards third man for a single
short of a good length, moves way a little and pushes that towards point
tries to be expansive, made a bit of room and tried to blast that through the off side but mistimed it back to the bowler
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and drops it towards cover
Haddin isn't middling them, this one's an example, short and wide, made room to cut that over point, got a thick outside edge instead, got it wide of third man for a couple of runs
middles this one all right, in the zone for Haddin, that landed full and he smashed it over mid-on for a boundary
goodish length on the off, gets forward and defends it towards cover
a jab more than a pull but very well timed, short and he gets it wide of midwicket but there is protection in the deep there, a couple more
a full delivery outside off and he tried to steer that behind point, missed
shortish outside off, chops it towards cover, no single on offer there
low full toss, comes down the track and drives it wide of deep cover for a single
short of a length outside off and that's eased through point and cover for a single
slower one on middle and it's pushed into the leg side for a single
gone! Malinga strikes, Perera takes his third catch, pitched up outside off and Cutting tries to drive it through cover, gets a thick edge and Perera dives to his right to snap that one

Oh dear, a first baller on debut, a deceptive slower one from Malinga, Richardson didn't spot it, it died low on the batsman and Richardson missed it to be struck low on the pad, perhaps just in line with leg stump, he's got to go
solid defensive, goodish length and he stylishly played it towards extra cover
another slower one from Malinga, pushes it straight to midwicket
gets across and presses that one away, Australia slid further in that Powerplay
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and drops it into the leg side to get a single
shortish on middle and leg, struck high on the pads as he tries to turn it into the leg side
short and it's slapped off the back foot wide of deep cover for a couple of runs
goodish length on the off and it's pushed straight to extra cover
slightly short on the off, rocks back and punches that one to cover
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and pushes that to extra cover
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler
shortish outside off, guides that one towards third man for a single
angling in towards middle, gets on the back foot and pushes it down the pitch
ooh, goodish length and he skies that one, makes room and lofts it high, Tharanga moves back and runs back and dives, but it evades him

appeal for a catch, short of a good length outside off, tries to open the face there to play it past point, it's given not out but the Sri Lankans have reviewed it, Hot Spot shows no heat signature, the umpire is taking his time to decide this, no real sound in live motion, the appeal was spontaneous but no strong technical evidence there of a deflection. Would you believe it, that's been given out. Surprise all around, McKay is surprised, the decision has been overturned.
goodish length on middle, gets across and defends it into the off side
slower one bowled outside off, Haddin moves away and lofts it over mid-off for a few runs
pitched up on middle, drives it down to long-on for a single
bowled on a length outside off, drives it down towards mid-off from the crease
short of a good length outside off, nips away and he flirts with that one, beaten
straight on middle and it's pushed back to the bowler
steps forward and taps that towards cover

Haddin swings it into the stands, a one-handed catch in the crowd, length ball outside off and he smashes that one off a length into the crowd, a lad dressed in grew, holding a milk can in the other hand, nochalantly just snapped it with his left hand
cracked it off the front foot towards extra cover, couldn't get it through
slower one bowled outside off, guided towards short third for a single
goodish length and it's eased through the covers into the deep for a single
slower one outside off and it's cracked towards extra cover, mistimed again
gets on the back foot and defends that one into the off side
slower one bowled on a length on the off and it's pushed back to the bowler
slightly short outside off and it's chopped down towards point
bowled that one straight on middle and he's pushed it back down the pitch now
full and wide and it's sliced towards deep point, Haddin doesn't take the single
pushes that one into the off side
slower one outside off, steals a single dropping that one in front of point to keep strike for the next over
full toss outside off, a low full toss, drives it wide of extra cover for a single
a fumble at mid-off after Doherty called for a single, pushed it past the bowler and raced off
Haddin made some room and Kulasekara chased him, Haddin dug that one out back to the bowler
streaky but he'll take it, full outside outside off, more width on this time, Haddin moved away to crack that through point, got a thick edge wide of the diving keeper for a boundary
low full toss on middle, drives that to long-on for a single
short of a length outside off and that one has been left alone
Fifty for Haddin, who punches that through cover for a single, good comeback for the man, has played well under pressure here for Australia
gets outside the line does Doherty and plays that back to the bowler
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and plays it back to the bowler
gets across and turns it fine for a couple of runs, Malinga runs across, in fact it's three for Doherty who just clipped that fine
Haddin holes out, found deep midwicket, pitched on a length and he sensed a chance, swung it hard but flat and straight to Thirimanne in the deep

inn2.comm: goodish length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the off side
in the channel outside off stump, gets forward and leaves that one alone through to the keeper
Australia have struck in no time, pitched up outside off and Tharanga drives it through the line, or tries to, just a hint of away movement, gets a thin edge and Haddin snaps it easily
bowls that one in the channel outside off and he sees it through to the keeper
slightly short outside off, cut hard through point, uppish but wide of point and he gets the single
slightly short on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to cover
slightly short on middle and off and it's pushed back towards the bowler
pushed it a little fuller and it's played in the same region
short of a good length on the off and it's tapped away into the off side
bowled at 132.6kmph, slightly short and he's played it away towards point
in the channel outside off stump, quicker at 136.2 kmph and it's been left alone to the keeper
shortish on middle and a promising start for Richardson who begins his ODI career with a maiden over, defended on the pitch off the back foot
appeal for lbw but that would have missed leg I think, short of a good length on leg stump and it could well have been sliding down as he tried to work it
pushed just wide of mid-off off the front foot for a single to get a single
ooh, yorker length outside off, tries to dig it out and he did so, but over Haddin's head, bump ball and over the keeper for a boundary
goodish length outside off, nips away from a good length and he flirts with that one, misses
pushed it full outside off and that's driven straight to mid-off
short of a good length on middle, gets across to play it square, seems to strike him high on the pads, on the thigh infact, they get a single
bowls that at 136.2 kmph, short of a good length and it's pushed off the back foot to point
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and stabs it to point
pushed it full outside off and he goes for an expansive drive but misses
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and stabs it down into the off side
pitches on a good length and he crunches that one towards cover off the front foot
short of a length outside off, goes for the cut does Dilshan but can't make contact, will feel he missed out there
slightly short on middle and leg and that's been turned down towards fine leg for a single
goodish length outside off and that's been defended towards point
short and wide and he goes for the cut, Thirimanne misses, again
goodish length, gets front and across, bowled at 131.5kmph, defended towards mid-off
pitched on a length this time, stylishly driven but straight to mid-off
sliding on the pads is Richardson, at 134.9kmph, tried to flick it square, didn't connect, did with the pads though
goes for it and misses again, bit of width from the bowler and he tries to smash that through extra cover, on the up, doesn't make contact
short of a good length outside off and he plays it down towards point
inside edge, tries to drive it through extra cover, came back in just a hint, didn't miss the stumps by much, a couple more to fine leg
slightly short outside off and he guides that one past point for a single
a touch too straight and Dilshan collects his first boundary, angling in towards middle and he drives it hard through mid-on and midwicket for a boundary
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it to the bowler
on middle and leg, gets across and drives it towards midwicket
short of a good length and it's crunched off the back foot towards point
on a good length, reaches forward and taps it down towards point

over second slip, Hussey couldn't reach it, Thirimanne was getting frustrated, stepped out of the pitch and tried to smash that over extra cover, got a thick edge and it flew over the slips for a boundary
gets across slightly and defends that one towards cover from the crease
pitched on a good length on middle, forces it into the leg side, mistimes it to midwicket
bowled at 135.4kmph, on the pads, missed opportunity he'll think, fullish and he tried to play the on-drive but was struck on the pads
bowled at 140.9kmph, short of a good length and he tried to crack that hard through the off side but didn't connect well enough
short of a good length on middle, gets forward and turns it towards midwicket
slightly short on leg stump, tries to turn it down, think it clipped the pads on the way down to fine leg
Thirimanne steps outside the line and pushes it down towards mid-on
short of a good length on leg stump, tries to work it square does Dilshan, gets it high on the pads, bowled at 136.2 kmph
good length on middle, gets front and across and turns the face, ends up being more of a thick inside edge towards fine leg
bowled at 137.1kmph, gets forward and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length on middle, works it square off the back foot for a well-run two
pushed it full on the off and Dilshan drives that straight to mid-off, that was bowled at 139.3kmph

run-out attempt, short of a good length on the off, pushed towards cover and rushes for the single, an attempt at the striker's end but Thirimanne dives and gets in, would have been close had that hit
pitched on a length and Dilshan goes at that one hard but can't time it well, straight to mid-off
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it through square leg for a couple more runs
finally connects one properly, on the up, drives it hard and uppishly between cover and point, in the gap and four runs
shortish outside off, mistimes a cut this time, straight towards point
angling in towards off, rocks forward and defends it with a straight bat to the bowler
Dilshan's not timing them, pitched on a length and he had enough room there to try and blast that through cover, that's what he was trying to do but couldn't middle it
short of a good length on middle and off from Cutting, gets on the back foot and plays it to point
drops that one short outside leg stump and he clips it towards fine leg for a single
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and defends him towards square leg
shortish at 138.3kmph and it's pulled, along the ground, through to deep square leg for a single
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot towards cover
good length on middle and off, drives it straight towards extra cover
shortish outside off, mistimes it towards point from the crease
on a good length, rocks forward and opens the face to guide that through to third man for a single
bowls that in the channel outside off, a bit of away movement for McKay, that's been left alone to the keeper
shortish on middle, rocks on the back foot and plays it towards midwicket
pitched on a good length on middle, gets front and across and plays it to mid-off
shortish outside off, runs that one down to third man for a single
superbly cut, was that out of frustration? Whatever it was, it came out right, short of a length on middle, created room by moving away and slashed it along the ground behind point
good comeback from Cutting, bowled at 140.2kmph, pushed it full, almost yorker length, defended into the leg side
goodish length on middle, gets front and across and chips that wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and plays it back onto the pitch
goodish length on the off and he pushes that towards cover
goodish length again, opens the face and plays it towards point from the crease
pushes that one down towards long-on for a single
tossed up on the off, drives that safely towards long-off for a single
plays that gently down to long-on for one more
short of a good length, gets on the back foot and punches it towards long-off for a single
sent back, gets outside the line to that one and turns it towards midwicket
turns in from outside off, gets an inside edge as he tries to open the face, gets a single towards short fine
upper-cut from Thirimanne, Cutting bowled that short, made a bit of room and guided it over slip for a couple of runs, third man went across to cut that off
short of a good length, gets on the front foot and pushes it to cover
short of a good length, covers the line and guides that one towards point
slightly short on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it towards midwicket from the crease
goodish length on the off, gets forward and drives it towards midwicket
a boundary that raises Sri Lanka's half-century, short of a length, made room to cut that and probably went much finer than he wanted, fetched him four though, third man is a little square
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot towards long-off for a single
gets on the back foot and turns it into the leg side
tossed up outside off, steps outside the line and plays it back down the pitch
Thirimanne takes it from the off stump and paddles it in the vacant short-fine region for a single
shortish outside off, the field has moved in on the off side, cut hard into the ground straight to point
flatter and quicker and that's cracked hard wide of deep extra cover for a couple of runs
pitched up outside off and that was driven straight to extra cover
beautifully driven, lovely crunching sound but straight to the extra cover fielder
excellent fielding at cover by Smith, pitched up again from Richardson and that is cracked hard off the front foot but Smith dived to his left to stop that one and prevent some runs
uppish, pitched up and he leaned forward and sliced that one between cover and point, opened the face but timed it well and in the gap
good length this time from Richardson, Thirimanne gets across and turns it wide of midwicket for a single
slightly short on middle and Dilshan clips it behind square for a single
angling in towards middle, gets forward and drops it into the off side
shortish outside off, cut away towards deep point for a single

oh, dropped, got across to that quicker delivery from round the wicket, chipped it towards midwicket and Smith dived forward there, may have just got his hands under that one but couldn't hold on, jarred his finger there, a toughie
gets forward and pushes that one back down the pitch

appeal for lbw, Dilshan is struck on the pads as he charged down the track to dispatch him over midwicket, missed, not given, Australia have asked for a review, pitches on leg and it hit the back leg as Dilshan missed, would that have gone on to hit the stumps? It went on straight. It's the umpire's call, says Eagle Eye, would just kissed leg stump, it says. Dilshan survives
tossed up outside off and he pushes it towards extra cover from the crease
floating it on the off, gets across and turns it towards midwicket
flighted on middle, comes down the track and drives it straight to midwicket
the googly, shortish outside off, waits for it, taps it down to short third man
flighted, much more air on this one, comes down the track and drives it to long-on for a single
floated it on the off stump, reaches forward and defends that one to cover
round the wicket to the left-hander, shortish on the off, gets on the front foot and plays it back
knocks that one down into the off side for a single
pitched outside leg and he tried to sweep that square, lobbed off the pads
pushes it straight towards extra cover
short of a length outside off, cracked it towards point from the crease
turned away from a good length on the off, beat him with the spin there, just goes past the outside edge
nicely timed, pitched on a length outside off, cracks it wide of a diving point for a single
on a good length outside off, tries to crash that through extra cover but good timing has eluded him today
fullish outside off, chipped that one over extra cover for a single, again, not in full control
pitched in the blockhole from McKay and it's been defended into the off side
picked the slower one did Thirimanne, came down the track while simultaneously making some room, McKay had dragged it short, Thirimanne dispatched it over mid-on for a boundary
waits for that to turn away, moves back and crunches it towards deep cover for a single
tossed up on middle, comes down the pitch and drives it to long-on for a single
shortish outside off, cracks it off the back foot towards cover, can't beat the in-field
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot past cover now for a single
comes down the track, takes it from a length and drives it to long-on for a single
cut into the ground towards point from the crease
dropped short by McKay, he rolls his wrists over that one and pulls it down to deep square leg for a single
drops that one short outside off and Dilshan drags it past midwicket, big gap behind that fielder and he finds the boundary
angling in towards middle, pushes it towards mid-on from the crease
goodish length and he drives that back to the bowler on the up
back of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and turns it into the leg side
shortish on leg stump and that's tucked down towards fine leg for a single
tosses it up outside off, comes down the track and plays it to extra cover
flatter on the off stump, taps it away into the off side
tossed up, steps out and converts it into a full toss and drives it wide of deep extra cover for a couple of runs
fifty for Thirimanne, driven down to long-on for a single, that's his fifth fifty in ODIs, started off slowly but is moving along well now
pitched up on the off and that's been driven hard but straight to extra cover
Dilshan picks up a boundary, that was flighted, he came down the track, got to the pitch and drilled it hard past the diving midwicket, mid-on is inside the circle
bowled at 135.2kmph, pitched full and he drives that straight to extra cover
falls safe, dropped short on middle, pulled but uppish and it lands safely in front of deep square leg, just the single
driven on the up by Dilshan but can't get it past mid-off, short of a good length
slightly short on the off, gets forward and tucks it into the leg side for a single
angling in towards the off stump from round the wicket, gets forward and pushes it to mid-on
dropped short on middle and he plays this one well, pulls it square but was in complete control of the shot, fine leg got to it in time and cut it off, just the single
beaten through the gate, floated it up on a length outside off and got it to turn in just a hint, Thirimanne defended outside the line to that one and was beaten
gets forward and knocks it into the leg side for a single
Dilshan comes down the track and heaves that through square leg for a single, mistimed
takes it from a length and drives it down to long-on for a single
looped up on the off and he converts it into a low full toss to drive it to long-off for a single
flighted on the off, drives it down to long-on for one more
bowled on a length outside off, gets forward and drives it towards cover
a couple more to Thirimanne, short outside off and he guided it nicely over slip wide of third man, 100 up for Sri Lanka and that's also a century stand between these two
short of a good length, bowled at 140kmph, gets on the back foot and taps it to cover
that one's down the leg side and is called a wide
goodish length on the off and he gets across to defend it to point
pitched on a length outside off and that's driven neatly wide of deep cover for a single
angling in towards middle and he clips it wide of midwicket for a single
short outside off, turns away and he cuts it away to point
shortish on the off, punched it from the crease towards midwicket
on the pads and he tries to sweep it fine, struck on the pads as it turned in from outside leg
comes down the track,drives it towards long-off for a single
shortish on middle and he drags it through square leg into the deep for a single
comes down the track and pushes it down towards long-off for a single
nicely driven, straight on middle and it's crunched past the bowler for a couple of runs
nipped away from a good length outside off and Dilshan wasn't all too comfortable against that one
low full toss on the off and he's dragged it through midwicket for a single
round the wicket and he drives that square towards point from the crease
too much width there from Cutting, short and wide and Thirimanne thrashes that to the point boundary, no chance there for third man
shortish outside off, chops that one behind point for a single
tossed up on middle, comes down the track and pushes it past the bowler
short on the off, gets on the back foot and clips it past square leg
good length outside off, stabbed wide of cover for a single
short outside off, cracked towards deep point for a single
angling in towards middle, Thirimanne steps out and drives that nicely inside out over extra cover for a boundary, Sri Lanka are coasting now

that was close, driven straight back to the bowler, Thirimanne was backing up and Richardson got a hand to it as he tried to stop it on his follow through, didn't miss the stumps at the non-striker's end by much
short of a good length outside off, pushed towards point from the crease
gets forward and turns it wide of mid-on for a single, Dilshan gets to his half-century
fullish outside off and that was sliced past point for a single
shortish outside off, tries to open the face there and guide it past slip, misses
bowled on a good length, pushes it back down the pitch to the bowler
short of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it down in front of the  bowler
he's been strong in that region today, short of a length and he made some room to cart that over point for a one bounce four
this time he guides that towards third man, was the slower one from Cutting
short of a good length outside off, Dilshan has a swoosh and misses
back of a length on the off and that's been tapped to point from the crease
pitched on a length and it's driven through the line towards mid-off
short of a good length on middle, turns it off the back foot behind square for a single
gets on the back foot and turns it through square leg for one more
dropped it short on middle and kept it down did Thirimanne, playing it down to square leg
bad ball from McKay, short ball down the leg side and Thirimanne helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, Doherty can't stop that
bowls that one short outside off and he lets it through this time

bowls that one short outside off, crunches it off the back foot past point, they scramble back for the second but would have been interesting had that hit direct from the deep, Thirimanne was really trying hard to make it back
goodish length on the off and he gets forward to tap it into the leg side
short of a length outside off, crunched it into the ground towards point
good length on the off, gets front and across and pushes it straight to midwicket
Dilshan falls, Cutting gets his first ODI wicket, a soft dismissal in the end, gets forward and just spoons a catch to Maxwell at point
goodish length and he is off the mark immediately, pushes it past point for a single
thick outside edge from Thirimanne as he pushes at one outside off, well wide of slip for a single
short of a good length on the off, gets forward and taps it towards cover
Thirimanne swings across the line, fetches that from just outside off and drags it uppishly between midwicket and mid-on for a couple of runs

appeal for lbw, there were two noises, there may have been an inside edge, Australia are not going for a review, they can't because they don't have one left, nips back in from  a good length, Hot Spot though didn't capture anything, may have hit both pads, ooh, close
stifled appeal for a catch, missed the bat, went off the thigh as he tried to turn that fine, good take by Hughes jumping to his right
short on middle and he did a good job keeping it down, playing it down towards deep square leg for a single
short of a good length and it nips away to just go past the outside edge as he pushes off the back foot
around a good length, trying to knock it down into the off side, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg
sliding on the pads, gets on the back foot to play it to square leg, is struck high on the pads
beautifully driven down the ground, pitched on a length on middle and he offers a straight bat, past mid-on and mid-off for a couple of runs
beaten, pushing at a tempting delivery outside off, a little inside the line there, was beaten
pitched up on the off, drives it towards mid-off off the front foot
beaten there, got it to angle in and then nip away, beat the outside edge
a low full toss, driven down to long-off for a single
fullish on middle and off and it's defended into the off side
tossed up on middle and it's driven back to the bowler down the pitch
angling it on middle and it's defended watchfully towards cover
made a bit of room, dropped it in front of point for a quick single
stabbed that spinning delivery from the crease towards point
round the wicket, short outside off, crunched past point for a single
on a length, reaches forward and defends that into the off side
hard and flat, that's a six, on a length and he swings it hard over the deep square leg boundary, Kane Richardson is a tall man but he couldn't reach it
pitched up outside off, plenty of width and Perera crashes that through extra cover for four more
slightly short on middle, turns it into the leg side for a single
slightly short on the off, turns it behind square for a single to keep strike
tossed up on the off, drives it down the ground to long-off and he takes single
flighted on middle and it's pushed straight to mid-on
turns it towards short fine leg for a single
fires that one down the leg side and it's a wide
comes down the pitch and takes a single by pushing that towards cover
an inside edge on the pads for Perera, rolls down towards short fine
drives that one straight back to the bowler, Thirimanne still stands a chance
Thirimanne takes a chance and gets a boundary, that was tossed up and he came down, got to the pitch and swung it into that gap between long-on and deep midwicket
takes a single, drives it wide of midwicket, a fumble and they have to take a single
gets forward and outside the line and he defends
quicker through the air, on the off stump and he defends it on the pitch
shortish on middle and it's played towards midwicket
slightly short, turns in, he calmly defends it towards silly point

Reaches his century and scores the inning runs as well, short and he makes room to cut that past point to complete the formalities, it's his first List A century, he's relieved, takes off his helmet, acknowledges the applause and then shakes hands with the hosts, the series is level 1-1
